page.shortlink: api reporting namespace report generator class
page.description: Report text generator (used to generate HTML, plaintext ang RTF)

property.name: persisted
property.description: Type "C". internal persisted state - none, connection, instance. This is used for report objects that stay around, which is not typically the case with web applications where the object lives only as long as the web request.

property.name: contents
property.description: Type "C". Generated contents of report (if generating to string)

property.name: toc
property.description: Type "C". Generated table of contents for report.

property.name: ReportObjectResources
property.description: Type "ReportObjectResources". Generated bitmaps etc for HTML reports.

property.name: Arguments
property.description: Type "SQL::Arguments". SQL arguments to pass to report.

property.name: cachePrefix
property.description: Type "C". Internal unique cache id - used to manage cached lookups - useful when optimizing paginated reports.

methodref.name: ApplyOrder
methodref.description: Apply an order (modify definition to include added order at detail level).

methodref.name: Close
methodref.description: Force close for persisted reports.

methodref.name: ContinueFromPrevious
methodref.description: Internal context for a header - continued from pervious page.

methodref.name: ContinueOnNext
methodref.description: Internal context for a footer - continued on next page.

methodref.name: DefinitionFromLayout
methodref.description: Return report definition for the named layout.

methodref.name: DefinitionFromReportDef
methodref.description: Given a report definition (instance), create an HTML definition.

methodref.name: EmitParameters
methodref.description: For the current context, emit the parameters required to re-construct the report.

methodref.name: EmitResource
methodref.description: Adds a named resource object, and return the name that was passed in.

methodref.name: Generate
methodref.description: Generate report as text, using a report definition.

methodref.name: GenerateFromOpenTable
methodref.description: Generate a report from an already open table.

methodref.name: GenerateToFile
methodref.description: Generate report as file, using a report definition (employs streaming, this can be used for *very* big reports.

methodref.name: GenerateToMemory
methodref.description: Generate report as new in-memory table, use first grouping as record - keycolumns specifies column/expression pair, returns name of table.

methodref.name: GenerateToTable
methodref.description: Generate report as new table, use first grouping as record - keycolumns specifies column/expression pair, returns name of table.

methodref.name: Get
methodref.description: Get a report object pointer using a name.

methodref.name: GetArguments
methodref.description: Returns a list of arguments the report expects.

methodref.name: GetCurrentFilter
methodref.description: Get Current Filter.

methodref.name: GetImports
methodref.description: Return a list of arguments the report and children of the report use.

methodref.name: GetName
methodref.description: Return a name that can be used to retrieve the report later.

methodref.name: Load
methodref.description: Create a new report generator.

methodref.name: SaveResources
methodref.description: Save resources as files to path.

methodref.name: SetBookmarkTemplate
methodref.description: Sets the bookmark template.

methodref.name: SetIndexTemplate
methodref.description: Sets the index template.

methodref.name: SetParentSession
methodref.description: Sets the parent session so that global context can be shared with generated reports.

methodref.name: SetTocTemplate
methodref.description: Sets the toc template.

methodref.name: SubreportCollapse
methodref.description: Generate an expanded subreport inside a current report context.

methodref.name: SubreportExpand
methodref.description: Generate an expanded subreport inside a current report context.

methodref.name: SubreportGenerate
methodref.description: Generate a subreport inside a current report context.

methodref.name: UseMemoryOptimization
methodref.description: Set memory override.
